workshoptitle: Inconsistent Data and Financial Losses Are a Thing of the Past: Making Distributed Transactions Easy with Oracle MicroTx

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always first. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Set Up the Environment
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Integrate MicroTx Client Libraries with XA Sample Application
Lab 4: Provision Autonomous Databases for use as Resource Manager
Lab 5: Trade Stocks with the Bank and Stock-Trading Application

tutorials.description: Cleanly dispose all OCI resources created by ORM for the workshop, and delete the stack
tutorials.title: Lab 6: Clean Up the Environment
Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
